mapper.select: select H.hotel_Name AS hotel_Name, G.hotelImage_FileName AS hotelImage_FileName, H.hotel_category AS hotel_category , H.hotel_Addr1||' '||H.hotel_Addr2||' '||H.hotel_Addr3 AS hotel_Addr , O.room_name, to_char(F.finish_date-1,'yyyy/mm/dd') AS finish_date , R.res_totalPrice AS res_totalPrice , F.seq AS seq, F.fk_res_number AS fk_res_number, R.fk_room_idx AS fk_room_idx, R.fk_member_idx AS fk_member_idx from TBL_HERE_FINISH F JOIN tbl_here_reservation R ON F.fk_res_Number = R.res_Number JOIN tbl_here_roomInfo O ON R.fk_room_idx = O.room_idx JOIN tbl_here_hotelInfo H ON O.fk_hotel_idx = H.hotel_idx JOIN tbl_here_hotelImage G ON G.fk_hotel_idx = H.hotel_idx where R.fk_member_idx = #{member_idx} and (TRUNC(sysdate - F.finish_date) between 0 and 12) and F.finish_paymentStatus = 1 order by F.finish_date desc
select seq_here_review_no.nextval from dual
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_here_review(review_no, fk_seq, title, content, grade0, grade1, grade2, grade3, grade4, registerday, status) values(#{review_no}, #{seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{grade0}, #{grade1}, #{grade2}, #{grade3}, #{grade4}, default, default)
insert into tbl_here_review_img(review_img_no , fk_review_no, wasImgname, orgImgname) values(seq_here_review_img_no.nextval, #{fk_review_no}, #{wasImgname}, #{orgImgname})
mapper.select: select review_no, fk_seq, title, content, registerday, grade0, grade1, grade2, grade3, grade4, allGrade, fk_room_idx, name, room_name from( select rownum AS rno, review_no, fk_seq, title, content, registerday, grade0, grade1, grade2, grade3, grade4, allGrade, fk_room_idx, name, room_name from( select review_no, fk_seq, title, content, to_char(V.registerday,'yyyy/mm/dd') AS registerday , grade0, grade1, grade2, grade3, grade4 , round((grade0+grade1+grade2+grade3+grade4)/5,1) AS allGrade , R.fk_room_idx AS fk_room_idx, name, I.room_name AS room_name from tbl_here_review V JOIN tbl_here_finish F ON fk_seq = seq JOIN tbl_here_reservation R ON fk_res_Number = res_Number JOIN tbl_here_roomInfo I ON fk_room_idx = room_idx JOIN tbl_here_member M ON R.fk_member_idx = M.member_idx where mstatus = 1 and V.status = 1 and R.fk_hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx} order by review_no desc )V )T where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select review_no, title, content , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy/mm/dd') AS registerday , I.review_img_no AS review_img_no , I.fk_review_no AS fk_review_no , I.orgImgname AS orgImgname , I.wasImgname AS wasImgname from tbl_here_review R JOIN tbl_here_review_img I ON R.review_no = I.fk_review_no where R.status = 1 order by review_no desc, review_img_no desc

select nvl(round(avg(grade0),1),0) AS grade0 ,nvl(round(avg(grade1),1),0) AS grade1 ,nvl(round(avg(grade2),1),0) AS grade2 ,nvl(round(avg(grade3),1),0) AS grade3 ,nvl(round(avg(grade4),1),0) AS grade4 ,nvl(round((avg(grade0)+avg(grade1)+avg(grade2)+avg(grade3)+avg(grade4))/5,1),0) AS allGrade ,count(*) AS allReviewNum from tbl_here_review V JOIN tbl_here_finish F ON fk_seq = seq JOIN tbl_here_reservation R ON fk_res_Number = res_Number where V.status = 1 and R.fk_hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx} order by review_no desc
select count(*) from tbl_here_review V JOIN tbl_here_finish F ON fk_seq = seq JOIN tbl_here_reservation R ON fk_res_Number = res_Number where status = 1 and fk_hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx}

select review_no, fk_seq, title, content, to_char(registerday,'yyyy/mm/dd') AS registerday , grade0, grade1, grade2, grade3, grade4 , round((grade0+grade1+grade2+grade3+grade4)/5,1) AS allGrade from tbl_here_review where status = 1 and fk_seq = #{seq} order by review_no desc

select review_no, fk_seq, title, content , to_char(registerday, 'yyyy/mm/dd') AS registerday , I.review_img_no AS review_img_no , I.fk_review_no AS fk_review_no , I.orgImgname AS orgImgname , I.wasImgname AS wasImgname from tbl_here_review R JOIN tbl_here_review_img I ON R.review_no = I.fk_review_no where R.status = 1 and fk_seq = #{seq} order by review_no desc, review_img_no desc
select count(*) AS count from tbl_here_review_img where fk_review_no = #{review_no} group by fk_review_no order by fk_review_no desc

select seq from tbl_here_review V JOIN tbl_here_finish F ON V.fk_seq = F.seq JOIN tbl_here_reservation R ON F.fk_res_number = R.res_number JOIN tbl_here_member M ON R.fk_member_idx = M.member_idx where V.status =1 and member_idx = #{member_idx}

SELECT * FROM (select sum(service_spa) AS spa , sum(service_minibar) AS minibar , sum(service_wifi) AS wifi , sum(service_towel) AS towel , sum(service_tv) AS tv , sum(service_airconditioner) AS airconditioner , sum(service_fridge) AS fridge , sum(service_showerroom) AS showerroom , sum(service_bathtub) AS bathtub , sum(service_hairdryer) AS hairdryer , sum(service_iron) AS iron , sum(service_kitchen) AS kitchen from TBL_HERE_HOTELINFO H JOIN TBL_HERE_ROOMINFO R ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN TBL_HERE_SERVICE S ON fk_room_idx = room_idx where hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx}) UNPIVOT ( status FOR service IN (spa,minibar,wifi,towel,tv,airconditioner,fridge ,showerroom,bathtub,hairdryer,iron,kitchen))

select P.fk_room_idx AS room_idx, R.room_name AS room_name, sum(P.roomprice) AS roomprice, cnt from tbl_here_roominfo R JOIN tbl_here_hotelinfo H ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN tbl_here_roomprice P ON P.fk_room_idx = R.room_idx join ( select fk_room_idx , count(*) as cnt from tbl_here_roomPrice where roomprice_date >= to_date(#{startday},'yyyy-mm-dd') and roomprice_date < to_date(#{endday},'yyyy-mm-dd') group by fk_room_idx )Z on P.fk_room_idx = Z.fk_room_idx where H.hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx} and cnt = ( to_date(#{endday},'yyyy-mm-dd') - to_date(#{startday},'yyyy-mm-dd')) and roomprice_date >= to_date(#{startday},'yyyy-mm-dd') and roomprice_date < to_date(#{endday},'yyyy-mm-dd') group by P.fk_room_idx, R.room_name, cnt order by P.fk_room_idx

select fk_room_idx AS room_idx, roomprice_quantity from tbl_here_roominfo R JOIN tbl_here_hotelinfo H ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN tbl_here_roomprice P ON P.fk_room_idx = R.room_idx where fk_hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx} and roomprice_date = to_date(#{startday},'yyyy-mm-dd')

select fk_room_idx, hotelimage_filename, roomimage_filename from TBL_HERE_HOTELINFO JOIN TBL_HERE_HOTELIMAGE H ON hotel_idx = H.fk_hotel_idx JOIN TBL_HERE_ROOMINFO R ON hotel_idx = R.fk_hotel_idx JOIN TBL_HERE_ROOMIMAGE ON room_idx = fk_room_idx where hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx}

select distinct I.fk_room_idx AS fk_room_idx, R.room_name AS room_name, I.roomimage_filename AS roomimage_filename from tbl_here_roominfo R JOIN TBL_HERE_HOTELINFO H ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN tbl_here_roomprice P ON P.fk_room_idx = room_idx JOIN Tbl_Here_Roomimage I ON I.fk_room_idx = room_idx where hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx} order by I.fk_room_idx

select fk_room_idx AS room_idx ,decode(bedtype, 'BED_SINGLE' , '싱글침대' , 'BED_DOUBLE' , '더블침대' , 'BED_TWIN' , '트윈침대' , '온돌방') AS bedtype , room_person, room_addperson from tbl_here_roominfo R JOIN tbl_here_hotelinfo H ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN ((SELECT fk_room_idx, BED_SINGLE,BED_DOUBLE,BED_TWIN,BED_ONDOL from tbl_here_hotelinfo H JOIN tbl_here_roominfo R ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN tbl_here_bed B ON fk_room_idx = room_idx where hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx}) UNPIVOT ( status FOR bedtype IN (BED_SINGLE,BED_DOUBLE,BED_TWIN,BED_ONDOL) ))X ON X.fk_room_idx = R.room_idx where status != 0 order by fk_room_idx

select fk_room_idx AS room_idx ,decode(spatype, 'SPA_WPOOL' , '월풀' , 'SPA_SAUNA' , '사우나' , 'SPA_MASSAGE' , '마사지베드' , 'SPA_HINOKKI' , '하노끼탕' , 'SPA_OPENBATH' , '노천탕' , 'SPA_HALFPOOL' , '반신욕' , '욕실내 TV') AS spatype from tbl_here_roominfo R JOIN tbl_here_hotelinfo H ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN ((SELECT fk_room_idx, SPA_WPOOL,SPA_SAUNA,SPA_MASSAGE,SPA_HINOKKI,SPA_OPENBATH,SPA_HALFPOOL,SPA_TV from tbl_here_hotelinfo H JOIN tbl_here_roominfo R ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN tbl_here_spa S ON fk_room_idx = room_idx where hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx}) UNPIVOT ( status FOR spatype IN (SPA_WPOOL,SPA_SAUNA,SPA_MASSAGE,SPA_HINOKKI,SPA_OPENBATH,SPA_HALFPOOL,SPA_TV) ))X ON X.fk_room_idx = R.room_idx where status != 0 order by fk_room_idx

select fk_room_idx AS room_idx ,decode(spatype, 'THEME_MOOIN' , '무인텔' , 'THEME_PARTY' , '파티룸' , 'THEME_MIRROR' , '미러룸' , 'THEME_DOUBLEFLOOR' , '복층룸' , 'THEME_PRINCESS' , '공주룸' , 'THEME_TERRAS' , '야외테라스' , 'THEME_OCEAN' , '오션뷰' , 'THEME_LAKE' , '호수뷰' , '스카이뷰') AS themetype from tbl_here_roominfo R JOIN tbl_here_hotelinfo H ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN ((SELECT fk_room_idx, THEME_MOOIN,THEME_PARTY,THEME_MIRROR,THEME_DOUBLEFLOOR,THEME_PRINCESS,THEME_TERRAS,THEME_OCEAN,THEME_LAKE,THEME_SKY from tbl_here_hotelinfo H JOIN tbl_here_roominfo R ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN TBL_HERE_THEME T ON fk_room_idx = room_idx where hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx}) UNPIVOT ( status FOR spatype IN (THEME_MOOIN,THEME_PARTY,THEME_MIRROR,THEME_DOUBLEFLOOR,THEME_PRINCESS,THEME_TERRAS,THEME_OCEAN,THEME_LAKE,THEME_SKY) ))X ON X.fk_room_idx = R.room_idx where status != 0 order by fk_room_idx

select fk_room_idx AS room_idx ,decode(servicetype, 'SERVICE_SPA' , '스파' , 'SERVICE_MINIBAR' , '미니바' , 'SERVICE_WIFI' , '와이파이' , 'SERVICE_TOWEL' , '욕실용품' , 'SERVICE_TV' , 'TV' , 'SERVICE_AIRCONDITIONER' , '에어컨' , 'SERVICE_FRIDGE' , '냉장고' , 'SERVICE_SHOWERROOM' , '객실샤워실' , 'SERVICE_BATHTUB' , '욕조' , 'SERVICE_HAIRDRYER' , '드라이기' ,'SERVICE_IRON' , '다리미' , '전기밥솥') AS servicetype from tbl_here_roominfo R JOIN tbl_here_hotelinfo H ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN ((SELECT fk_room_idx, SERVICE_SPA,SERVICE_MINIBAR,SERVICE_WIFI,SERVICE_TOWEL,SERVICE_TV,SERVICE_AIRCONDITIONER,SERVICE_FRIDGE,SERVICE_SHOWERROOM,SERVICE_BATHTUB,SERVICE_HAIRDRYER,SERVICE_IRON,SERVICE_KITCHEN from tbl_here_hotelinfo H JOIN tbl_here_roominfo R ON fk_hotel_idx = hotel_idx JOIN TBL_HERE_SERVICE S ON fk_room_idx = room_idx where hotel_idx = #{hotel_idx}) UNPIVOT ( status FOR servicetype IN (SERVICE_SPA,SERVICE_MINIBAR,SERVICE_WIFI,SERVICE_TOWEL,SERVICE_TV,SERVICE_AIRCONDITIONER,SERVICE_FRIDGE,SERVICE_SHOWERROOM,SERVICE_BATHTUB,SERVICE_HAIRDRYER,SERVICE_IRON,SERVICE_KITCHEN) ))X ON X.fk_room_idx = R.room_idx where status != 0 order by fk_room_idx
